text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon has opened a four-length lead! And it looks like 
she's going to keep it!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Bourbon leads! 2,400 meters can't stop her from going gate to wire! 
Six for six! The undefeated Double Crown is hers!

Rice finishes the Japanese Derby in second. She may have failed to 
overtake Mihono Bourbon, but it's huge progress nonetheless.
A few days later, I take the team to an amusement park in Chiba.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! We're here—the amusement park of dreams! With the 
princess's castle, and Big Lightning Mountain!

I thought it'd be nice to treat her to the theme park she's always 
wanted to go to, but, well…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Wait… There's no one else here. It's like our very own kingdom. Hehe. 
That sounds nice. ♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Trainer… Rice here truly believes this is the place she's been so keen 
on visiting…

McQueen whispers into my ear as an oblivious Rice Shower beams 
with excitement.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I know money's tight this month, but did you really have to bring her to this amusement park?
Yeahhh…
Yeahhh…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, McQueen! Rumor has it there's a mystery attraction 
underground. We gotta uncover the truth!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: H-hey! That door is for employees only!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Let's get going too, Trainer! ♪
Y-yeah, all right.

They say time flies when you're having fun, so I guess that means we 
had fun, location notwithstanding.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
We got to go on almost every ride. Good thing there weren't many 
people today.

Every time she expresses genuine joy at being here, I feel a little 
pang of guilt.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hey, um… Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I want to end the day by going on the ferris wheel. So, um… would 
you join me?

Oh no, she's too pure—my heart can't take it… If she wants to ride the 
ferris wheel, then the ferris wheel it is.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hehe… Yay!

The city rolls on and on as far as the eye can see, dyed orange by the 
setting sun.

…But the breathtaking sight is lost on Rice Shower. Something's been 
bugging her ever since we got on.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, um… It's just…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to say thank you. For everything. I really didn't think I'd be 
able to achieve so much.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I mean, I still can't believe that I got second place in the Derby.
choice_data_list: All thanks to your hard work.
All thanks to your hard work.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hehe…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
…So, that got me thinking. I'm happy with second place, but… what if 
I could be first?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I… I want to win. Against Mihono Bourbon.
I want to win.

Her ambition has only grown and grown, just as the gap between her 
and her undefeated rival has shrunk.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Wanting to win against someone like this—I couldn't have done it 
without you. So I had to let you know.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ohh, now that I say it out loud, it's kind of embarrassing…

Must be your newfound confidence talking. Next race, you're taking 
first. We'll beat Bourbon together.

Must be your newfound confidence talking. Next race, you're taking 
first. We'll beat Bourbon together.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Together… Yeah, we can do it!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Whew! Never been so amused in my life! What about you, Rice?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it was like a land of dreams. I had so much fun. ♪

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer, thanks for the treat today. I'll keep up the hard work!
choice_data_list: And I'll be right by your side.
And I'll be right by your side.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Looks like someone had a magical time. I suppose you were right to 
bring her here.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …But do make sure your next treat is a bit more proper.
I-I'll do my best.
The following day, Rice dives back into training with renewed vigor.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Just keep following, just keep following…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ooh! She's hanging in there!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: McQueen keeps upping the pace, but Rice isn't falling behind.

That's what happens when you set a clear goal for yourself. It helps 
bring out the best in you.

That's what happens when you set a clear goal for yourself. It helps 
bring out the best in you.
Especially so in her case, it looks like.
Especially so in her case, it looks like.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: By a clear goal, you mean McQueen? Or Mihono Bourbon?

Not just them. When Rice sets her mind to something, she never gives 
up on it—no matter what it is.

Not just them. When Rice sets her mind to something, she never gives 
up on it—no matter what it is.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Uh-huh. I gotchu.

At this rate, she'll be able to give her best performance yet in her 
rematch with Bourbon.

The training will do some good for McQueen too, who has the 
Takarazuka Kinen coming up.

Rice seems to be lifting the entire team higher. But sometimes, reality 
drags you back down.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: McQueen?!
Her desperate cry echoes across the track…
